group_1.textCenter: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Time to make some items...♪@Next up, a potion♪
Take a Gem in hand, squeeze it tight♪

group_1.textLeft: This is an emergency, Coordinator!
Oh my! Whatever is the problem, you two?

group_1.textRight: We hurt this girl way worse than we meant to.
Is she going to be okay?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, if it isn't Tsuruno!
Hmm...
Oh, dear me, her Soul Gem is far too clouded.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101800:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?@How about her body?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that part of her is just fine.
She is the Mightiest, after all.

group_1.textRight: That's a relief...
Totally.

group_1.textLeft: Aren't you enemies?
Yes. However...

group_1.textRight: ...our intention isn't to kill her.
We want to save all Magical Girls!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
You really are good, noble girls.
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Oh no! We have to get Tsuruno out of here@immediately!

group_1.textRight: Why?

group_1.textLeft: Can't you tell? Look at her Soul Gem!

group_1.textRight: O-oh, this is very bad! We must hurry!
Everything I did was worthless...@Meaningless...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
Meaningless if you fail...and worthless@even if you succeed.
No one ever wanted you to do any of it, so@you don't even have dust to console you.

group_1.textRight: I have nothing left...
Ahh... So from the very beginning, I wasn't@meant to achieve a single thing...
*Sob*

group_1.textLeft: Does it hurt?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Is it hard to bear?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Then cast it all aside and sleep now.
Give yourself up... Drift off into the dark…
You won't ever need to think again.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
Wait...

group_1.textLeft: What is it? Hurry, come this way...

group_1.textRight: No... I can't go...

group_1.textLeft: Why not?

group_1.textRight: I do have something left!
Maybe I haven't managed to achieve anything,@and restoring our old glory is just a dream.
But I still have something precious!

group_1.textLeft: And that is?

group_1.textRight: I met Momoko and Mifuyu...
I met Master Yachiyo, Iroha, and everyone.@I made really great friends...
There are so many important people in my@life that I love so much.

group_1.textLeft: So what? That has nothing to do with lofty@goals or your family name.

group_1.textRight: But...I have to make all of them happy.
That's my new goal.
And there's no way I can let it go!

group_1.narration: "You need to find your own happiness@and cherish that."

group_1.textRight: I get it now...

group_1.textLeft: So, is that all you had to say?

group_1.textRight: No...
I just realized that I already found my own@happiness.
I didn't even notice. I was never fighting@for glory...
I was fighting for my friends.

group_1.textLeft: That doesn't change anything.
You've still trampled all over your@grandfather's feelings.
You were chasing something that nobody@asked you to.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's true...

group_1.textLeft: So you accept it.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I accept it.
I think I finally understand what Grandpa@was trying to tell me.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: You don't achieve greatness by trying to.@Greatness is just a result.
I think Grandpa was trying to tell me not@to try to be great.
So I'll treasure my own happiness from now @on.

group_1.textLeft: And how are you going to do that?

group_1.textRight: You're me, aren't ya?
So, I guess the first thing I need to do is@accept myself.
It was meaningless, even worthless to try@so hard to achieve greatness.
So, from now on, I'm gonna fight to help@Iroha and everyone else.
I'll find Ui, and I'll bring Mifuyu back.
I dunno what comes after that, but I want@to make everyone happy.
That's what makes me happy.
If I continue to treasure that happiness,@I'm sure that will become something great.

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: Uh huh!
Who knows, maybe I'll even be selling noodles@in the White House one day.

group_1.textLeft: That could be fun.

group_1.textRight: You really are me! You get what I'm saying!
